dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 592 IH: Protecting School Milk Choices Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Tenney (for herself, Mr. Thompson of Pennsylvania, Mr. Fitzgerald, Mr. Lawler, and Mr. Van Orden) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and Workforce

form.official-title: To amend the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act with respect to the types of milk offered under the school lunch program, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Protecting School Milk Choices Act of 2025.

section.header: Types of milk offered under the school lunch program
section.text: Section 9(a)(2)(A) of the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act (42 U.S.C. 1758(a)(2)(A)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by redesignating clause (iii) as clause (iv); and
by inserting after clause (i) the following:

clause.text: shall offer students flavored and unflavored fluid milk; and
may offer students lactose-free fluid milk; and
